summary: Standalone Armor Retexture of Steel plate
descriptionHtml:
3/7/12 Update: Just added a new Color scheme Red and Black, slightly darker version for all you evil crusaders out there, this is Not the shadowknight version this was a request and i will get to weapons and shield soon.


3/3/12 Update: Now avaible in red and Gold version Stand alone and fully working at the forge gauntlets and all just have to scroll to the buttom of the list for some reason. anyways i am very pleased with the way it came out i hope you enjoy and i will coninue to work and evil/dark crusader version and weapon and shield on the way.


2/29/12 Update: Now (thanks to MGbeach for guidance) Finally Stand alone! craftable at any forge and temperable. Enjoy! Working in First Person now as well


Update: now works with Female characters, now with Proper Maps (no more Armor showing through the Tabard.) also now avaible in two Versions

This is a Stand alone ReTexture of Steel plate Armor, Based on Fantasy type crusader and Paladin Characters. its a Working Progress working to make it look better everyday, Enjoy.


Installation: 
Place all Files In Data Folder, or place each folder in its proper directory. (textures/armor/crusaderplate. then Meshes/armor/crusaderplate. and place crusadercraftable.esp in data folder.) Hope that Helps everyone


Future Updates: soon to be ,  Black version for Dark Crusader/Shadowknight , Shield and Weapon to Match, make gauntlets Craftable,  
and a Light armor version (might use apprentice robes for my base model)
author: Longnose
